Package com.billiards

Class PoolStick

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion
      • com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
        • com.billiards.PoolStick
  • public class PoolStick
extends com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite
    Represents the pool stick that is used to strike the cueball. It can spin by following the cursor. Holding left click will charge the ball which changes striking strength.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      float HEIGHT
      Height of the pool cue texture
      float WIDTH
      Width of the pool cue texture

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PoolStick​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, float x, float y, Billiards game)
      Two param constructor that moves the pool stick according to the ball.
      PoolStick​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture, com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin, Billiards game)
      Three param constructor that uses anti-aliasing to smooth pool stick.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PoolStick

        public PoolStick​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 origin,
                 Billiards game)
        Three param constructor that uses anti-aliasing to smooth pool stick. Sets the position of the pool stick to follow the ball.
        Parameters:
        texture - pool stick design
        origin - position of pool stick
        game - main game for accessing methods

      • PoolStick

        public PoolStick​(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 Billiards game)
        Two param constructor that moves the pool stick according to the ball.
        Parameters:
        texture - pool stick design
        game - main game for accessing methods
        x - x coord to initialize pool stick
        y - y coord to initialize pool stick
